title: Android Tech Lead
resume: My role as an Android Tech Lead is coordinate planning and delivery new features. Some of my responsibilities are:
resposabilities: Technical design of new features and review technical designs from others, always looking for scalability and sustainability inside the project. Also, expose these technical designs to the consumers and negotiate times for its implementation.
Keep the quality of the project using code-review, unit testing, and any kind of tool that could help to keep and improve the quality of the project
Planning and estimate epics, tasks and features in order to complete successfully every sprint.
Training, mentoring and coaching the developers to keep the whole team in a motivated environment.
Provide everything to the developers needs to complete their task in every sprint.

title: Senior Android Developer
resume: As an Android Developer I was mainly in charge of the design, implement new features, bugs fixing and coordinate the APIs with the backend team

title: Product Engineer
